item.title: ID-3 north at ID-6
item.description: ID-3 north at ID-6. The White Pine Scenic Byway follows ID-3 north from here to Rose Lake.

item.title: ID-3 North Approaching ID-6
item.description: ID-3 north approaching ID-6. Use ID-6 west for Potlatch. Use ID-3 north for St. Maries and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: ID-8 West at ID-3
item.description: ID-8 west at ID-3. ID-8 west joins ID-3 south to Deary. Use ID-8/ID-3 for Deary and Moscow. Use ID-3 north for St. Maries.

item.title: ID-8 West At ID-3
item.description: ID-8 west at ID-3.

item.title: ID-8 West Approaching ID-3
item.description: ID-8 west approaching ID-3.

item.title: ID-3 North - White Pine Scenic Byway
item.description: White Pine Scenic Byway on ID-3 north.

item.title: ID-3 North - White Pine Scenic Byway
item.description: White Pine Scenic Byway on ID-3 north.

item.title: ID-3 North at ID-97 North
item.description: ID-3 north at ID-97 north to Harrison.

item.title: St. Joe River Scenic Byway
item.description: St. Joe River Scenic Byway on St. Joe River Road east.

item.title: End ID-3 at I-90
item.description: End ID-3 north at I-90 east to Kellogg and Missoula.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 34
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 34 - ID-3/Rose Lake/Harrison/St. Maries.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 34
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 34 - ID-3/Harrison/St. Maries/Rose Lake.

item.title: End ID-3 South at US-12
item.description: Junction US-12 at southern end of ID-3.

item.title: End ID-3 South at US-12
item.description: End ID-3 south at US-12.

item.title: End ID-3 South at US-12
item.description: End ID-3 south at US-12.

item.title: I-90 East Exit 34 Offramp at ID-3
item.description: I-90 east Exit 34 offramp at ID-3 to Rose Lake and St. Maries.

item.title: I-90 West Exit 34
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 34, ID-3/Rose Lake/St. Maries/Harrison.

item.title: I-90 West Exit 34 Offramp at ID-3
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 34 offramp at ID-3 south to Rose Lake and St. Maries.

item.title: ID-3 South at I-90 East Onramp
item.description: ID-3 south to Rose Lake and St. Maries at I-90 east to Kellogg.

item.title: ID-3 South at ID-5
item.description: ID-5 junction on ID-3 south.

item.title: ID-3 South at ID-5
item.description: ID-3 south to Bovill and Potlatch at ID-5 west to Plummer.

item.description: ID-3 south at ID-8.

item.title: ID-3 South at ID-8
item.description: ID-3 south approaching ID-8. ID-3 follows ID-8 south to Deary.

item.title: ID-3 South at ID-97
item.description: ID-3 south at ID-97 north to Harrison.

item.title: ID-3 South at ID-99
item.description: ID-3 south to Juliaetta and Lewiston at ID-99 north to Troy.

item.title: ID-3 South at ID-99
item.description: ID-3 south approaching ID-99.

item.title: ID-8 East at ID-3
item.description: ID-8 east to Bovill and St. Maries, at ID-3 south to Kendrick.

item.title: ID-8 East at ID-3
item.description: ID-8 east at ID-3 south. ID-3 follows ID-8 north to Bovill.

item.title: ID-8 West at ID-3 South
item.description: ID-8 west/ID-3 south at ID-3 south.

item.title: End ID-6 East at ID-3
item.description: End ID-6 east at ID-3. The brown shields indicate a state scenic byway, in this case White Pine Scenic Byway. The White Pine Scenic Byway turns north on ID-3 here.

item.title: End ID-6 East at ID-3
item.description: End ID-6 east at ID-3. Continue straight for ID-3 south to Clarkia; turn left for ID-3 north to St. Maries and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: ID-3 North - Kootenai County
item.description: Entering Kootenai County on ID-3 North
